find_package(LibWaveform REQUIRED)

########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################

if(NOT USE_DYNAMIC)
   set(USE_DYNAMIC 0)
   message(STATUS "Dynamic loading disabled, dlmopen is bad")
    set(FLEX_LIB_INTERFACE "flex_waveformlib_static_intf.cpp")
endif(NOT USE_DYNAMIC)
if(USE_DYNAMIC)
    # add_definitions(-DUSE_DYNAMIC)
    message(STATUS "Dynamic loading not supported")
    message( FATAL_ERROR "USE_DYNAMIC not supported")
    # set(FLEX_LIB_INTERFACE "flex_waveformlib_dl_intf.cpp")
endif(USE_DYNAMIC)

include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX
list(APPEND flex6k_sources
    flex6k_sink_impl.cc
    flex6k_source_impl.cc
    FlexRadio6000.cpp
    ${FLEX_LIB_INTERFACE}
    flex6k_command_impl.cc 
    flex_buffers.cc
    flex_status_tree.cc
    flex6k_config_impl.cc )

set(flex6k_sources "${flex6k_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE )
if(NOT flex6k_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT flex6k_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-flex6k SHARED ${flex6k_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-flex6k LibWaveform::waveform gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime)
target_include_directories(gnuradio-flex6k
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-flex6k PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_flex6k_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-flex6k PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-flex6k)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_flex6k_sources
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-flex6k)

if(NOT test_flex6k_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_flex6k_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_flex6k_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("flex6k_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
